preference.name: RDVReleasedPartsCollectorServer
preference.preference_description: Defines the host name and port number of the machine on which the Released Parts Collector server is running. Valid Values: Accepts a single string as a value. Must define the host name and port number in the following format: host-name:port-number For example: trysun12:1551
